Title: The Damned
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Matthew Negrete, Channing Powell
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: The plan involving Alexandrians, Kingdommers and Hilltoppers unfolds; As Rick continues to fight, he encounters a familiar face.
